/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, their leaves forming a canopy overhead. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in soft light. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the expansive view. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the trees and the buildings, and gives the viewer a sense of being immersed in the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The overall effect is one of tranquility and order, a typical characteristic of a well-planned urban landscape.
